name: Reach the Number!
description:
This is a kind of experimental game as an entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Dice will continually drop on your raft which is kind of a giant dice as well. Odd coincidences.

Use your cursor (or finger for mobile users) to flip any dice off the raft to make sure you don't overshoot your target number.

Only the top side of the dice on the raft will count.
